channel.title: python on Anurag's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in python on Anurag's Blog

item.title: Integrate Azure AD SSO with SAML for your FastAPI Application using PySAML2
item.description: Recently I had to work on a Azure AD SAML integration for a FastAPI application. I looked around the internet for a how to and stitched together a solution from multiple sources. I am writing this post as a how to on integrating Azure AD SAML SSO into a FastAPI application so that there is a single source for others to use. I am using PySAML2 and I am sure there are better ways to do this but this is how I did it.

item.title: pydoc
item.description: I gave a talk recently at the Cleveland Python Meetup on pydoc. Here is the notebook explaining it all: https://github.com/CLEpy/CLEpy-MotM/blob/master/pydoc/pydoc.ipynb
